title: CONTEST! Win 1 of 3 pair of LOOK X-Track Race Carbon Pedals worth $130 each!
content:
As cyclists, we’re always LOOKing for that “next level” product that better connects us with our bikes and delivers improved performance. And the LOOK X-Track Carbon XC pedals do both, which is why we reviewed them so highly! Now, you can win your own pair (worth $130 each!!!) just for answering a few questions.

When it comes to the X-Track family of pedals, LOOK says they’ve chosen to concentrate on the interaction of three major factors that make a superior pedal:

  • Contact surface area
  • Weight
  • Entry/release

With a wide platform that provides generous support and stability while optimizing power transfer and comfort, combined with a competitive weight, the X-Track family of pedals could be the perfect off-road pedal. And now you can find out for yourself!

Just answer this quick 4-question survey below to enter to WIN one of THREE pairs of X-Track Race Carbon Pedals! All multiple-choice questions and email fields require an answer to enter the contest.

SURVEY CONTEST RULES: By submitting your response, you agree to these rules, terms & conditions: Only one entry per person. Multiple entries from same person will disqualify that person. All participants must provide a valid email address, as that is how LOOK Cycle will contact the winner(s). All entrants’ email addresses may be added to the email newsletter/marketing lists for Bikerumor.com and LOOK Cycle. Any emails sent from either party will contain “unsubscribe” options. Contest closes just before midnight (11:59pm) PST on Saturday, February 27th, 2020. Winner(s) will be selected at random and results are final. Winner(s) will have one week from the date of notification of winning to respond, after which LOOK Cycle and/or Bikerumor.com reserve the right to choose an alternate winner and original winner forfeits all right to any prize(s).
author: Ron Frazelle
